mapper.select: SELECT R.RNO, R.RWRITER, R.RTITLE, R.RCONTENT, R.RDATE, P.PNO, P.PTYPE FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON (R.PNO = P.PNO) ORDER BY R.RDATE DESC
SELECT R.*, RC.RCCONTENT FROM REPORT R JOIN RCATEGORY RC ON(RC.RCNO = R.RCNO) WHERE RNO = #{rNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{rcNo}, #{rWriter}, #{reported}, NULL, #{rTitle}, #{rContent}, DEFAULT)
